title: Kaihō Shōjo
synopsis: 100 years into the future, Japan is a thriving country, with calm weather and beautiful sights. The Dominion, a war-driven nation that has steadily been conquering the world, soon takes over Japan and begins stealing the Guardian Spirits' energy. Faced with crisis, the government of Japan decides to fire the current incompetent prime minister and elect Yokuichiro Ozora as the president of Japan. As Japan heads into battle against the Dominion, Yokuichiro is assassinated while giving a speech. Yokuichiro is replaced with his daughter Shoko and the nation of New Japan is born. The parliamentary Battleship Nagata and Shoko, alongside the Liberator, "Kamui", set out to war against the Dominion.
background:
The game was initially released in Japan through "Guild01", a compilation of short games published by Level-5 for the Nintendo 3DS. The game featured prologue and epilogue sequences which were animated by Bones. The game and animation was later dubbed and released separately through the Nintendo eShop in Western regions.
The game would later be ported to iOS devices in 2013. A Japanese-exclusive visual novel sequel, titled "Liberation Maiden SIN", was developed and released for the PlayStation 3 and PlayStation Vita in 2013 and 2014 respectively.
